metaData.label: TRAD
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal SP.WFR.MG AND MSD_CORE_Prescription__c equal H_core AND Product_Name contains CARDIOMET AND ( AGE greater than 35 OR AGE is null  )

metaData.label: PO
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal SP.WFR.MG AND MSD_CORE_Prescription__c equal L_core AND Product_Name contains CARDIOMET AND ( AGE greater than 35 OR AGE is null  )

metaData.label: OTHERS
metaData.criteriaDescription: MSD_CORE_Prescription__c equal M_core AND SPECIALTY_1 equal SP.WFR.MG AND Product_Name contains CARDIOMET AND ( AGE greater than 35 OR AGE is null  )

metaData.label: SCIENTIST
metaData.criteriaDescription: MSD_CORE_Prescription__c equal N_core AND SPECIALTY_1 equal SP.WFR.MG AND Product_Name contains CARDIOMET AND ( AGE is null  OR AGE greater than 35 )
